Fish Stocks Data Explorer: Explore available data on the world's fish stocks.
Total biomass relative to biomass at maximum sustainable yield (MSY)
Total biomass relative to biomass at management target
Spawning stock biomass relative to biomass at maximum sustainable yield (MSY)
Spawning stock biomass relative to biomass at management target
Total catch relative to catch at maximum sustainable yield (MSY)
Total catch relative to catch at management target

Fishing mortality relative to mortality at maximum sustainable yield
Fishing mortality relative to mortality at management target

column12: RAM Legacy Stock Assessment Database. 2018. Version 4.44-assessment-only. Released 2018-12-22. Retrieved from DOI:10.5281/zenodo.2542919.
column15:
This data is sourced from the RAM Legacy Stock Assessment Database, which can be accessed here: https://www.ramlegacy.org/.


The primary publication describing the RAM Legacy Stock Assessment Database, and suggested citation for general use is:


Ricard, D., Minto, C., Jensen, O.P. and Baum, J.K. (2012) Evaluating the knowledge base and status of commercially exploited marine species with the RAM Legacy Stock Assessment Database. Fish and Fisheries 13 (4) 380-398. DOI: 10.1111/j.1467-2979.2011.00435.x
